trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface and cannot perform data source paging.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging" /> 为 <see langword="true" />，<paramref name="dataSource" /> 没有实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 接口，无法执行数据源分页。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataSource" /> does not implement the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface and <paramref name="dataBinding" /> is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> 未实现 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> 接口，<paramref name="dataBinding" /> 被设置为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new child table.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的子表。

trans-unit.source: Always returns a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" /> that represents the child table.
trans-unit.target: 总是返回一个表示子表的新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateChildTable%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create a child table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateChildTable%2A>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建子表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" />，表示数据源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the data source specified by the <c>dataSource</c> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <c>dataSource</c> 参数指定的数据源，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of column fields used to build the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 创建用来构建控件层次结构的列字段集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the fields used to build the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，包含用来构建控件层次结构的字段。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true`, a bound column field is automatically created for each field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性设置为`true`，绑定的列字段将自动创建为数据源中的每个字段。

trans-unit.source: Each bound column field is then displayed as a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the order that the fields appear in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 每个绑定的列字段则显示为中的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>字段在数据源中出现的顺序控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateColumns%2A> method is used to create the automatically generated column fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateColumns%2A>方法用于创建自动生成的列字段。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the default style for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件创建默认样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style for the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件样式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is used to create the default style for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法用于创建控件的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> object that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source for processing.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> 对象，该对象包含传递到数据源进行处理的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" /> that contains the arguments that get passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments" />，包含传递到数据源进行处理的参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that contains the arguments passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象，其中包含自变量传递到数据源。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object contains the arguments for paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中，<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象包含分页操作的自变量。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> class, you can override this method to specify your own values that are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />类，你可以重写此方法以指定你自己的值传递给数据源。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the data source item to bind to the row.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到行的数据源项的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Creates a row in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中创建行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> created using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定参数创建的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateRow%2A> method is used to create a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.CreateRow%2A>方法用于创建中的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically generates the rows needed to display the target data.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动生成的显示目标数据所需的行。

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将数据源绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 不能继承此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind> method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind>方法将数据绑定到数据源从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会解析所有活动模板中的控件的数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> method is called automatically if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control refers to a valid data source control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>如果自动调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是指一个有效的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: Instead of manually calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> method, you can use model binding with your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of a method that returns data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: 而不是手动调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>方法，你可以使用模型绑定，具有你<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind%2A>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.SelectMethod%2A>属性返回的数据的方法的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is then automatically populated with the data that is returned from the select method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>然后从选择的方法返回的数据自动填充。

trans-unit.source: Model binding can simplify your code for working with data.
trans-unit.target: 模型绑定可以简化你的代码用于使用数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind> method to bind a data source to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataBind>方法将绑定到数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个数组，该数组包含了显示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的项的主键字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含了显示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的项的主键字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性以指定字段或表示数据源的主键字段。

trans-unit.source: You should only set this property to the field or fields that are required to uniquely identify each row; for example, the ID column if an integer value uniquely identifies each row.
trans-unit.target: 你应仅将此属性设置为或多个唯一地标识每个行; 所需的字段例如，如果唯一的整数值的 ID 列标识的每一行。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property in order for the automatic update and delete features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性顺序自动更新和删除的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制工作。

trans-unit.source: The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to specify the row to update or delete.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要更新或删除的行情况下，这些键字段的值传递到数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when updating or deleting a row, use the `Keys` property of either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要检索密钥值更新时数据，也可以删除行，使用`Keys`任一属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>类。

trans-unit.source: For example, `e.Keys[0]` holds the value of the first data key in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`e.Keys[0]`保留的值中的第一个数据密钥<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If you need to retrieve the data key value when a row is selected, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要选择行时检索数据的密钥值，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection with the values from the specified field or fields, which provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each row.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动填充其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合的值从指定的字段或字段，它提供一种简便方式访问的每个行的主键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores these key field values in the control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将这些键字段值存储中的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: If these values contain sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you enable view-state encryption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A> property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些值包含敏感信息，强烈建议你通过设置启用视图状态加密<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ViewStateEncryptionMode%2A>属性`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。

trans-unit.source: When you use automatically generated field columns (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control makes sure that the columns that correspond to the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用自动生成字段列 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性`true`)，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，可以确保在中指定的列或多个字段对应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property of a column field is set to `false`, the column is not displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the data for the column does not make a round trip to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>列字段的属性设置为`false`，列才会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件和列的数据不会进行一次往返过程向客户端。

trans-unit.source: If you want the data for a column that is not visible to be available to the client, add the field name to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望为不可见要向客户端提供的列的数据，将添加到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property to specify the key field of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性指定数据源的键字段。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the `DataKeyNames` attribute of the `GridView` element in markup specifies two key fields by using a comma to separate the names.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，`DataKeyNames`属性`GridView`标记中的元素使用逗号分隔这些名称指定两个键字段。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, create a Web site that has the following:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例中，创建包含以下网站：

trans-unit.source: A connection to the AdventureWorksLT sample database and a connection string that is named `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`.
trans-unit.target: 连接到 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库和名为的连接字符串`AdventureWorksLTConnectionString`。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT sample database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何设置 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[如何： 设置 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库的 ASP.NET 开发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。

trans-unit.source: A LINQ-to-SQL data context class that is named `AdventureWorksLTDataClassesDataContext`.
trans-unit.target: LINQ SQL 数据上下文类，该类名为`AdventureWorksLTDataClassesDataContext`。

trans-unit.source: The data context must have a class for the SalesOrderDetails table.
trans-unit.target: 数据上下文必须具有 SalesOrderDetails 表的类。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create LINQ-to-SQL classes, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建 LINQ SQL 类的信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects that represent the data key value of each row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象集合，这些对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的每一行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> that contains the data key of each row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中每一行的数据键。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控件中的每一行的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object contains the values of the field or fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象包含的字段或字段中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>随后会将对象添加到控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象中的特定数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for the currently selected row.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象当前所选的行。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>属性直接检索当前所选行的数据密钥值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>属性来确定中所选行的数据键值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为了删除数据要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要删除行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源中删除位于指定索引位置的记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A> method to programmatically delete the record at the specified index from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A>方法，用于以编程方式从数据源中删除指定索引处的记录。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要删除来自外部的记录通常使用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，例如页上的其他控件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法也会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A> method to programmatically delete a record in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DeleteRow%2A>方法，用于以编程方式删除中的记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is not bound to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定到数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to does not support delete operations, or there is no delete command defined for the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定到的数据源控件不支持删除操作，或者没有为数据源定义删除命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要编辑的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的行的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1，指示没有正在编辑的行。

trans-unit.source: The row index is zero-based (the first row is row zero).
trans-unit.target: 是从零开始的行索引 （第一行是零）。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only in the following scenarios, which involve handlers for specific events:
trans-unit.target: 仅在以下情况下，这涉及到特定事件的处理程序中通常使用此属性：

trans-unit.source: You want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to open in edit mode for a specific row the first time that the page is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 你想<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制在特定行的编辑模式下打开显示的页面的第一个时间。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class or of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>的处理程序中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You want to know which row was edited after the row was updated.
trans-unit.target: 你想要知道哪些行已编辑后更新了该行。

trans-unit.source: To do this, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，可以检索的行索引从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You are binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 你正在绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>到通过设置数据源的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: In this case you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property after a postback or in handlers for events that are raised later than the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control might not enter edit mode for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>属性后回发或处理程序引发的事件中晚于<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件可能不进入编辑模式，为指定的行。

trans-unit.source: If you read the value of this property in other event handlers, the index is not guaranteed to reflect the row that is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 如果你读取的其他事件处理程序中的该属性的值，则不保证索引以反映正在编辑的行。

trans-unit.source: To determine which row the user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink in before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode, you can retrieve the row index from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定用户在哪一行已单击**编辑**按钮或中的超链接之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件进入编辑模式，您可以检索的行索引从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs.NewEditIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>中对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from entering edit mode after a user has clicked an **Edit** button or hyperlink, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true` in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件进入编辑模式，用户单击后**编辑**按钮或超链接、 集<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象传递给`true`中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A> property to determine which row was updated after it was edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditIndex%2A>属性来确定哪些行已更新后它已在中编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A message is displayed to indicate that the update was successful.
trans-unit.target: 显示一条消息来指示更新成功。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the row selected for editing in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中为进行编辑而选中的行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the row being edited in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中正在编辑的行的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>属性来控制正在编辑中的行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<EditRowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EditRowStyle%2A>属性来定义中正在编辑的行的自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定到不包含任何记录的数据源时会呈现的空数据行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that enables you to set the appearance of the null row.
trans-unit.target: 一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，使用该对象可以设置空行的外观。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the null row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>属性来控制中的 null 行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The null row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录，将显示为 null 的行。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<EmptyDataRowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property declaratively to specify a light blue background and a red font for the null row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>属性以声明方式指定具有浅蓝色背景和红色字体为 null 的行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定到不包含任何记录的数据源时所呈现的空数据行的用户定义内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含空数据行的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空数据行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过定义为空的数据行自己自定义用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义模板为空的数据行，第一次将`<EmptyDataTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制空数据行的样式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以使用内置用户界面为空的数据行通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是此属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically access controls that you declare in an empty data template, see [How to: Access Server Controls by ID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何以编程方式访问控件的空数据模板中声明的信息，请参阅[如何： 按 ID 访问服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/59964ef8-72ef-4159-9f1a-5b230ff46fb3)。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to define a custom template for the empty data row displayed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义模板，用于显示的空数据行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件绑定到数据源不包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定到不包含任何记录的数据源时所呈现的空数据行中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空数据行中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空数据行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制当绑定到控件的数据源不包含任何记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>属性来指定要在空的数据行中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制空数据行的样式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以通过设置定义为空的数据行自己自定义用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是此属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>属性优先。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A> property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EmptyDataText%2A>属性来指定要在空的数据行中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示验证程序控件是否会处理在插入或更新操作过程中出现的异常。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果验证程序控件将处理在插入或更新操作过程中出现的异常，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行的选择是基于索引还是数据键值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果行选择基于数据键值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false` and a row is selected, the same row is selected when a new page is displayed even though the new page has different data in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`和选择行时，会显示一个新页面，即使新页中有不同的数据时选择同一行。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, when you display a page that has different data in it, no row is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`true`时显示中，有不同的数据的页，不选择任何行。

trans-unit.source: If you then return to the page on which a row was selected, that row is still selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你然后返回到所选行的网页，该行仍处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side callbacks are used for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示客户端回调是否用于排序和分页操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示客户端回调用于排序和分页操作；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a sorting or paging operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control posts back to the server to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当执行排序或分页操作，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件回发到服务器以执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property is set to `true`, a service is called on the client to perform sorting and paging operations, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>属性设置为`true`、 服务客户端上调用来执行排序和分页操作，而不需要将发布回服务器。

trans-unit.source: Not all browsers support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a browser supports this feature, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定浏览器是否支持此功能，请使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: All columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection must support callbacks for this feature to work.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合必须支持此功能正常工作的回调。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合包含的列，不支持回调，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>、<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property to enable client-side callbacks for sorting and paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>属性来启用用于排序和分页操作的客户端回调。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns" /> collection contains a column that does not support callbacks, such as <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns" /> 集合包含不支持回发的列，如 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> used to store the field values.
trans-unit.target: 用来存储字段值的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> from which to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: 将从其中检索字段值的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include read-only fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含只读字段；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the primary key field or fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含主键字段；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the specified row and stores them in the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 检索在指定行中声明的每个字段的值，并将它们存储在指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ExtractRowValues%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ExtractRowValues%2A>方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>要检索的声明中指定的行的每个字段的值控件`row`参数。

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the extracted values include read-only fields and key fields by using the `includeReadOnlyFields` and `includePrimaryKey` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定提取的值使用是否包含只读字段和键字段`includeReadOnlyFields`和`includePrimaryKey`参数，分别。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own routine to retrieve the field values.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />类，你可以重写此方法以创建你自己的例程来检索字段值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 控件中的脚注行的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的脚注行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>属性是之后才可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要以编程方式操作页脚行中的，例如在添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 对任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>属性必须执行后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件已经被呈现; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将覆盖所有更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A> property to display the sort direction in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterRow%2A>属性显示在页脚行中的排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中脚注行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the footer row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 控件中脚注行的样式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>属性来控制中的页脚行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<FooterStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>属性来定义自定义样式中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回以控件为目标的回调事件的结果。

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回调的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>接口并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以异步方式检索数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法来检索到的数据返回到控件。

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要为其创建回调脚本的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给回调脚本的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 为执行排序操作的按钮创建回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行排序操作的按钮的回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackScript%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackScript%2A>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建执行排序操作的按钮的回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的网格线样式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="GridLines.Both" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="GridLines.Both" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A> property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>属性指定的网格线样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的样式。

trans-unit.source: Style
trans-unit.target: 样式

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: No gridlines are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 显示没有网格线。

trans-unit.source: Displays the horizontal gridlines only.
trans-unit.target: 显示水平网格线。

trans-unit.source: Displays the vertical gridlines only.
trans-unit.target: 显示垂直网格线。

trans-unit.source: Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 显示水平和垂直网格。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A> property to hide the gridlines in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GridLines%2A>属性来隐藏中的网格线<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 控件中的标题行的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的标题行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的标题行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>属性是之后才可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建中的标题行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example, when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要以编程方式操作标头行，例如，添加自定义的内容时，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 对任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>属性必须执行后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件已经被呈现; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将覆盖所有更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A> property to programmatically change the font color of the header row based on the sort direction.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderRow%2A>属性以编程方式更改的标题行的字体颜色基于排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的标题行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the header row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 控件中脚注行的样式的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>属性来控制中的标题行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<HeaderStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<HeaderStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>属性来定义中的标题行的自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件在页面上的水平对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A>属性指定的水平对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>页内的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了不同的水平对齐样式。

trans-unit.source: Alignment value
trans-unit.target: 对齐值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 水平对齐方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>尚未设置控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is left-aligned on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是左对齐页面上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is centered on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件居中的页上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is right-aligned on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是右对齐的页上的对齐。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件对齐页面的左侧和右侧边距。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A> property to align a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control on the right side of a page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HorizontalAlign%2A>属性对齐<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>页面右侧的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the pager row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示要初始化的页导航行。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns the pager row should span.
trans-unit.target: 页导航行应跨越的列数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource" />，表示数据源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 初始化在分页功能启用时显示的页导航行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializePager%2A> method is used to initialize the pager row displayed when the paging feature is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializePager%2A>方法用于初始化时启用分页功能时显示的页导航行。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the row to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示要初始化的行。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> objects that represent the column fields in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 对象数组，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的列字段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a row in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializeRow%2A> method is used to initialize a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.InitializeRow%2A>方法用于初始化中的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the data type to test.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示要检查的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的数据类型是否能绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的列。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的数据类型能绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的列，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.IsBindableType%2A> method is a helper method that is commonly used by control developers to programmatically determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.IsBindableType%2A>方法是通常由控件开发人员用来以编程方式确定指定的数据类型是否可以绑定到列中的帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following data types can be bound to a column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control:
trans-unit.target: 以下数据类型可以绑定到中的列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件：

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved control state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含保存的控件状态值的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control that need to be persisted, even when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 加载 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中需要保留的属性的状态（即使在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" /> 时）。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to load the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于加载中的属性的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中需要保留，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件保存的视图状态值的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the Web server control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定 Web 服务器控件的事件是否沿页的用户界面 (UI) 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已被取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to pass events from child controls to the page hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法实现<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将从子控件的事件传递到页层次结构。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnBubbleEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Rebinds the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control to its data after the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember" /> 或 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource" /> 属性更改之后，将 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID" /> 控件重新绑定至它的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind the control to its data after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件重新绑定之后，其数据的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> class, you can override this method to create your own routine to rebind the data.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />类，你可以重写此方法以创建你自己的例程重新绑定数据。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method notifies a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法通知<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>基础数据源已更改，该控件应重新绑定的控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>数据源视图的属性已更改时调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法通知，Web 服务器控件必须执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's View state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段的服务器控件的生命周期中，控件的视图状态尚未填充。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，当调用此方法时，无论是否的子级或父级到该控件不能访问其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保证其他服务器控件都可创建并准备好进行访问。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>时单击某一页导航按钮时，之后将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理的分页操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how provide an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event.

trans-unit.source: When the Add button is clicked for a given row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the name of the selected customer is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 对于给定的行的单击添加按钮时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，所选客户的名称添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈现控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>必须为该控件中的每一行创建对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>引发事件中的每一行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>创建控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如将自定义内容添加到行，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。
