trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how provide an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何提供的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: When a row is being created, its index is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control that is contained in the new row.
trans-unit.target: 当创建行时，将其索引存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>新行中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to determine the index of the row when the user clicks the command button.
trans-unit.target: 这使您能够确定行的索引，当用户单击的命令按钮。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnRowCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnRowCreated(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound" /> event.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈现控件，该控件中的每一行必须绑定到数据源中的记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>数据行时引发事件 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象) 中的数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如修改绑定到行，每次此事件发生时的数据的值的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如检查删除操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged" /> event.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>时单击某一行的选择按钮，但之后将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a status label with the currently selected row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如使用当前选定的行中，更新状态标签，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the selected row is persisted in the view state.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，在所选的行将保留在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: So even after a sorting or a paging operation, only that row will be selected.
trans-unit.target: 因此即使在排序或分页操作之后, 将选择仅该行。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSelectedIndexChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>单击超链接列进行排序后，之前引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消排序操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSorting%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSorting%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: There is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 没有 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting" /> 事件的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSorting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSorting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSorting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.OnSorting(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of pages required to display the records of the data source in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中显示数据源记录所需的页数。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的页数。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A> property to determine the total number of pages required to display the records in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页功能后 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A>属性来确定数据源中显示的记录所需的页的总数。

trans-unit.source: This value is calculated by dividing the total number of records in the data source by the number of records displayed in a page (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property) and rounding up.
trans-unit.target: 此值计算的数据源中的页中显示的记录数的记录的总数目除以 (所指定的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>属性) 和舍入。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A> property to determine the total number of pages displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageCount%2A>属性来确定的网页中显示总数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前显示页的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 当前所显示页面的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页功能后 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>属性来确定的当前显示页的索引。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed page.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式更改所显示的页面。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently displayed page in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>属性来确定在当前显示页的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property can be used to specify which page is displayed after the user selects a value from the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>属性可以用于指定用户的页导航行从选择的值后显示哪一页。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex" /> property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex" /> 属性被设置为一个小于 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件处理分页操作之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>时单击某一页导航按钮时，之后将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理的分页操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as a custom paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，自定义的分页操作，例如，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定用户选择的页的索引，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event to display the page number selected by the user from the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件以显示用户从的页导航行中选择的页号。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 在单击某一页导航按钮时，但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件处理分页操作之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event is raised when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>时单击某一页导航按钮时，之前将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理的分页操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，每次此事件发生时取消的分页操作，如事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式设置时，将不会引发此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定用户选择的页的索引，并可以指示是否应取消的分页操作。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的分页操作，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event to cancel the paging operation if the user attempts to navigate to another page when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>事件取消的分页操作，如果用户尝试导航到另一个时页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> object that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的页导航按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> that enables you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings" /> 的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的页导航按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A> property to control the settings of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A>属性控制的设置中的页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页功能时，将显示的页导航行 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`) 和包含允许用户导航到不同的页面控件中的控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>对象 (例如， `PagerSettings-Mode`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<PagerSettings>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<PagerSettings>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.Mode`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.Mode`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括的页导航行显示模式和自定义文本或导航控件的图像。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A> property declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerSettings%2A>属性以声明方式。

trans-unit.source: It sets the font and background for the pager row to blue and light blue, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 它将设置为蓝色和分别浅蓝色的字体和背景的页导航行。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的页导航行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中页导航行的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>属性来控制中的页导航行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`) and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页功能时，将显示的页导航行 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`) 和包含允许用户导航到不同的页面控件中的控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `PagerStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<PagerStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<PagerStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `PagerStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>属性以声明方式。

trans-unit.source: It sets the font and background for the pager row to blue and light blue, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 它将设置为蓝色和分别浅蓝色的字体和背景的页导航行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中页导航行的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含页导航行的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null，表示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: A pager row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to true).
trans-unit.target: 页导航行显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制当启用分页功能 (时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性设置为 true)。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: 页导航行包含允许用户导航到不同的页面控件中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用内置的页导航行用户界面 (UI)，你可以定义自己的 UI，通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A> property is set, it overrides the built-in pager row UI.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerTemplate%2A>属性设置，则它将重写内置页导航行 UI。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `<PagerTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义模板的页导航行，第一次将`<PagerTemplate>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<PagerTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以列出在开始和结束之间模板的内容`<PagerTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的页导航行的外观，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PagerStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将按钮控件添加到页导航模板来执行分页操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将执行的分页操作使用的按钮控件时其`CommandName`单击属性设置为"Page"。

trans-unit.source: The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 按钮的`CommandArgument`属性确定要执行的分页操作的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the command argument values supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了支持的命令参数值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: `CommandArgument` value
trans-unit.target: `CommandArgument` 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Next"
trans-unit.target: "下一步"

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the next page.
trans-unit.target: 导航至下一页。

trans-unit.source: "Prev"
trans-unit.target: "上一步"

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 导航到以前的页面。

trans-unit.source: "First"
trans-unit.target: "First"

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the first page.
trans-unit.target: 导航至第一页。

trans-unit.source: "Last"
trans-unit.target: "最后一个"

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the last page.
trans-unit.target: 导航至最后一页。

trans-unit.source: Integer value
trans-unit.target: 整数值

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 导航到指定的页码。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom pager template that allows the user to navigate through a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建自定义页导航模板，用户可以通过导航<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of records to display on a page in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件在每页上所显示的记录的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of records to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 要在单页上显示的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10。

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property to specify the number of records to display on a single page.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页功能后 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>属性来指定要在单个页面上显示的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property to display 15 records at a time in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>属性中的一次显示 15 记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize" /> property is set to a value less than 1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize" /> 属性被设置为小于 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that contains the data source.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含数据源的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />。

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified data source to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将指定数据源绑定到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件绑定到控件的指定的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" /> method is sealed, you should override this method if you need to perform any additional tasks when binding data.
trans-unit.target: 因为<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind" />方法密封的如果你需要执行的任何其他任务，绑定数据时，应重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 建立控件层次结构。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to establish the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于建立的控制层次结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给事件处理程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 方法中的回调处理程序创建参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建的自变量中的回调处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 为引发的一个或多个事件创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> 时所使用的事件参数。

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的合适的事件。

trans-unit.source: The page calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method when a postback event occurs that raises the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 页面调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法回发事件发生时将引发相应事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 加载和更改通知都完成时之后, 但尚未预呈现发生之前，此调用是在页的生命周期中。

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>引发的事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> used to render the server control content on the client's browser.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，用于在客户端浏览器上呈现服务器控件内容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象将 Web 服务器控件内容呈现给客户端浏览器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Render%2A> method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Render%2A>方法用于呈现客户端的浏览器使用指定的服务器控件内容<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 单击编辑模式中某一行的“取消”按钮以后，在该行退出编辑模式之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event is raised when the Cancel button of a row in edit mode is clicked, but before the row exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>时单击编辑模式中某一行的取消按钮后，将引发事件，但在该行退出之前编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如停止取消操作，如果它会将行放入某种意外状态，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使你可以确定当前行的索引，还可以指示应停止取消操作。

trans-unit.source: To stop the cancel operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要停止取消操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCancelEditEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event to display a cancellation message when the user cancels the update operation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>事件时用户取消的更新操作显示取消消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event to cancel the update operation when the data source is set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit>事件取消更新操作时以编程方式设置数据源。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button is clicked in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>中单击的按钮时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够在每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件也可以调用某些控件的内置功能。

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行这些操作之一，设置`CommandName`为下表中的值之一的按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: `CommandName` value
trans-unit.target: `CommandName` 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: "Cancel"
trans-unit.target: "取消"

trans-unit.source: Cancels an edit operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 取消编辑操作并返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>到只读模式的控件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCancelingEdit> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: “Delete”

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: 删除当前记录。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: "编辑"

trans-unit.source: Puts the current record in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 将当前记录置于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> 事件。

trans-unit.source: "Page"
Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行分页操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 集`CommandArgument`的按钮为"First"，"最后"、"下一步"、"上一步"或执行页编号，以指定的分页操作类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Select"
trans-unit.target: "选择"

trans-unit.source: Selects the current record.
trans-unit.target: 选择当前记录。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Sort"
trans-unit.target: "Sort"

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>事件。

trans-unit.source: "Update"
trans-unit.target: "更新"

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 更新数据源中的当前记录。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>单击上表中列出的按钮时将引发事件，则我们建议你使用该操作的表中列出的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您能够确定的命令名称和被单击按钮的命令参数。

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the row that raised the event, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the event argument that is passed to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定引发事件的行索引，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>传递给事件的事件自变量的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField> class automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property with the appropriate index value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonField>类自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>具有适当的索引值的属性。

trans-unit.source: For other command buttons, you must manually set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property of the command button.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他命令按钮，你必须手动设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>的命令按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> to `<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has no paging enabled.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>到`<%# Container.DataItemIndex %>`时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件具有未启用分页功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event to add the name of a customer from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control when a row's Add button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>事件的一位客户名添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制转移到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控制当单击某一行的添加按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event to update the price of a product when a row's button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>事件来更新产品的价格，单击某一行的按钮。

trans-unit.source: This example has the paging functionality enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to the appropriate row index.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有为启用分页功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件并设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandArgument%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件添加到相应的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row is created in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中创建行时发生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈现控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>必须为该控件中的每一行创建对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised when each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>引发事件中的每一行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>创建控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如将自定义内容添加到行，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being created.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使你能够访问正在创建的行的属性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问特定行的单元格中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定哪种行类型 （标头行和数据行等） 正在创建使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event to store the index of the row being created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control contained in the row.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件存储在中创建的行的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton.CommandArgument%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>行中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to determine the index of the row that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control when the user clicked the button.
trans-unit.target: 这使您能够确定包含的行的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>控制当用户单击按钮。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data row is bound to data in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中将数据行绑定到数据时发生。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>可以呈现控件，该控件中的每一行必须绑定到数据源中的记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>数据行时引发事件 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象) 中的数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如修改绑定到行，每次此事件发生时的数据的值的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the row being bound.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使你可以访问要绑定的行的属性。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问特定行的单元格中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being bound by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定正在绑定使用的是哪种行类型 （标头行和数据行等）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191882)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event to modify the value of a field in the data source before it is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>事件之前它将显示在修改数据源中的字段的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: 在单击某一行的“删除”按钮时，但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件删除该行之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>单击某一行的删除按钮，但之后时引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除的行。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如检查删除操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您能够确定受影响的行和可能发生的任何异常的数量。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeletedEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> event to check the result of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>事件检查删除操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: A message is displayed to indicate to the user whether the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 若要向用户表明该操作是否成功，显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: 在单击某一行的“删除”按钮时，但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件删除该行之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event is raised when a row's Delete button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>单击某一行的删除按钮后，之前引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除的行。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消删除操作中，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定当前行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消删除操作。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消删除操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值传递到数据源。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event to cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件取消删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The page contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that displays a list of customer names and addresses from the AdventureWorksLT database.
trans-unit.target: 页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>显示客户姓名和地址从 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的列表的控件。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the **Delete** link for a row, the handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event checks the last name of the person displayed in the row that the user is trying to delete.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击**删除**一行时，处理程序的链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件检查用户尝试删除的行中显示的人员的最后一个名称。

trans-unit.source: If the last name is "Beaver", the delete operation is canceled, and an error message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个名称为"Beaver"，删除操作已取消，并显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: For any other name, the delete operation proceeds and the row is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 对于任何其他名称，删除操作会继续并删除该行。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs> object to find the row that the user is trying to delete.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewDeleteEventArgs>对象可以查找用户尝试删除的行。

trans-unit.source: The example examines the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 该示例检查的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the value you want to compare to is a key value, you could examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果到所需值比较密钥值，可以检查<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合相反。

trans-unit.source: Rows are deleted from the CustomerAddress table instead of the Customer table in order to keep the example simple.
trans-unit.target: 为了使示例简单，而不是客户表 CustomerAddress 表中删除行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control shows the result of joining three tables: Customer, Address, and CustomerAddress.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示联接三个表的结果： 客户、 地址和 CustomerAddress。

trans-unit.source: When a CustomerAddress row is deleted, the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> row disappears.
trans-unit.target: 当删除行，相应 CustomerAddress<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>行将会消失。

trans-unit.source: Referential integrity constraints would make the code for an example that actually deletes rows from the Customer table more complex.
trans-unit.target: 引用完整性约束会使实际从更复杂客户表中删除行示例的代码。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to set up the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何设置 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的信息，请参阅[如何： 设置 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库的 ASP.NET 开发](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 发生在单击某一行的“编辑”按钮以后，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件进入编辑模式之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event is raised when a row's Edit button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>单击某一行的编辑按钮，但之前引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消编辑的操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定当前行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the edit operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消编辑操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewEditEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event to put a row in edit mode when the data source is set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>将行处于编辑模式时以编程方式设置数据源的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event to cancel the editing operation if the user attempts to edit the record for a company in the United States.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>取消编辑的操作，如果用户尝试在美国国内的公司中编辑的记录的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the column to use as the column header for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的列标题的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the column to use as the column header.
trans-unit.target: 用作列标题的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: In HTML, the header of a table can be associated with either a row or a column.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 中，可以与行或列关联的标头的表。

trans-unit.source: The direction is specified by setting the `scope` attribute of the `<th>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置指定的方向`scope`属性`<th>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in header row that can be displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件有内置的标题行，可以通过设置显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally specify a header column (usually the first or last column in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) by setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以选择指定一个标题列 (通常是第一个或最后一列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) 通过设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set, all cells in the column that corresponds to the specified field name are rendered as `<th scope="row">` elements.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性时，对应于指定的字段名称的列中的所有单元格都呈现为`<th scope="row">`元素。

trans-unit.source: Although the specified column is treated like a header, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> properties do not apply to the header column.
trans-unit.target: 指定的列都被视为标头，尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>标头列不适用于属性。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现`<th>`保留了元素，从而文本水平呈现为加粗和居中。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the behavior of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以重写的行为`<th>`元素使用级联样式表。

trans-unit.source: This property works only with bound fields.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于绑定的字段。

trans-unit.source: It does not work with template fields.
trans-unit.target: 它并不适用于模板字段。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> property to display a header column in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A>属性来显示中的标头列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects that represent the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 控件中数据行的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> that contains all the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的所有数据行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> property (collection) is used to store the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>属性 （集合） 用于存储中的数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection by creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object for each record in the data source and then adding each object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>通过创建集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象数据源中的每个记录，然后将每个对象添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to access a specific row in the control or to iterate though the entire collection of rows.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问控件中的特定行，或者用于循环访问的行的整个集合，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Only rows with their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property set to `DataControlRowType.DataRow` are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用行其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>属性设置为`DataControlRowType.DataRow`存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects that represent the header, footer, and pager rows are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>集合中未包含这些对象表示的页眉、 页脚和页导航行。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection to access the row being edited in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合来访问中正在编辑的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: After a row is updated, a message is displayed to indicate that the update was successful.
trans-unit.target: 更新了某行后，将显示一条消息来指示更新成功。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的数据行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the data rows in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的数据行的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the data rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>属性来控制中的数据行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> property is also set, the data rows are displayed alternating between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> settings and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>也设置属性，显示的数据行之间交替<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>设置和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AlternatingRowStyle%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `RowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<RowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<RowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A> property to declaratively define the style for the item rows in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowStyle%2A>属性以声明方式定义中的项行的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 发生在单击某一行的“更新”按钮，并且 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件对该行进行更新之后。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>时单击某一行的更新按钮，但之后将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件更新行。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如检查更新操作的结果，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the number of rows affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您能够确定受影响的行和可能发生的任何异常的数量。

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常的事件处理方法中通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdatedEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> event to check the result of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>事件，以检查更新操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: A message is displayed to indicate to the user whether the operation succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 若要向用户表明该操作是否成功，显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: 发生在单击某一行的“更新”按钮以后，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件对该行进行更新之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event is raised when a row's Update button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control updates the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>单击某一行的更新按钮后，之前引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件更新行。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消更新操作中，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the current row and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定当前行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消更新操作。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消更新操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can also manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections, if necessary, before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>集合，如有必要之前的值传递到数据源。

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these collections is to HTML-encode the values supplied by the user before they are stored in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些集合的常用方法是要进行 HTML 编码的用户提供的才能在数据源中存储的值。

trans-unit.source: This helps to prevent script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: 这有助于防止脚本注入式攻击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> collections are automatically populated only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to data by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.OldValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>自动填充集合时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>通过使用将控件绑定到数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> event to update the values in the data source object when the data source is set programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>事件时以编程方式设置数据源更新数据源对象中的值。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control that need to be persisted, even when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中需要保留的属性的状态（即使在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="false" /> 时）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于保存中的属性的状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中需要保留，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含保存的控件视图状态值的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object that contains the data key value for the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中选中行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> for the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 控件中选中行的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示当前未选择行。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象使用的指定的字段或字段的值的控件中的每一行。
