trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>随后会将对象添加到控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>属性用于检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象中的特定数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您只需要检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象的当前选定的行中，你可以只使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>作为快捷方式的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 这是与检索相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>由指定索引处对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to retrieve the data key value for the currently selected row directly.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>属性直接检索当前所选行的数据密钥值。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象，并想要访问的第一个字段以外的键字段，请使用索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象。

trans-unit.source: An example is shown below.
trans-unit.target: 一个示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性来确定中所选行的数据键值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the second key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用第二个键字段作为主/从方案中的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is used to display records from the Order Details table of the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件用于显示从 Northwind 数据库的订单详细信息表的记录。

trans-unit.source: When a record is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the details of the product from the Products table are displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 一条记录中的选中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中，从 Products 表产品的细节将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: ProductID is the second key name in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: ProductID 是中的第二个密钥名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: To access the second key, the value of GridView1.SelectedDataKey[1] is used as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问第二个密钥，GridView1.SelectedDataKey[1 的值] 用作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: No data keys are specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames" /> 属性中未指定数据键。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的选中行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中选中行从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that no row is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1，指示当前未选择行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the currently selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性来确定在当前所选行的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically select a row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性以编程方式选择控件中的行。

trans-unit.source: To clear the selection of a row, set this property to -1.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除行的选择，请将此属性设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the currently selected row can be customized by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用自定义当前所选行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To access the currently selected row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问当前选定的行，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to select the second row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when the control is initially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性以选择中的第二个行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制最初显示控件时。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex" /> property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex" /> 属性被设置为小于 -1 的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 发生在单击某一行的“选择”按钮，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件对相应的选择操作进行处理之后。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>时单击某一行的选择按钮，但之后将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a status label with the currently selected row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，例如使用当前选定的行中，更新状态标签，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event to display the name of the customer in the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件来显示所选行的中的客户名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 发生在单击某一行的“选择”按钮以后，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件对相应的选择操作进行处理之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event is raised when a row's Select button is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>单击某一行的选择按钮后，之前引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消所选内容的操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式设置时，将不会引发此事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the row selected by the user and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定用户选择的行的索引，并可以指示是否应取消了选择操作。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event to cancel a select operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging>事件取消选择操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-key value for the persisted selected item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中选择的持久项的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: The data key for the persisted selected item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中选择的持久项目的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that no item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，表示当前未选择项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象的引用，该对象表示控件中的选中行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the selected row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示控件中的选中行。

trans-unit.source: When a row is selected in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents that row.
trans-unit.target: 在选择行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>属性，以检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>表示该行的对象。

trans-unit.source: This is the same as retrieving the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at the index specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 这是与检索相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>由指定索引处对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用此对象访问所选行的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A> property to access the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRow%2A>属性可访问的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的所选的行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> object that enables you to set the appearance of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 对象的引用，使用该对象可以设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的选中行的外观。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle" /> 的引用，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的选中行的样式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>属性来控制在所选行的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一，以声明方式设置属性：

trans-unit.source: Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 将属性置于开始标记中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>窗体中的控制`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>对象 (例如， `SelectedRowStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Nest a `<SelectedRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套`<SelectedRowStyle>`元素开始标记和结束标记之间<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A> property to define a custom style for the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedRowStyle%2A>属性来定义中所选行的自定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data key value of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中选中行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: The data key value of the selected row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中选中行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set with a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for each row in the control using the value or values of the specified field or fields.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性设置以逗号分隔的表示数据源的主键值的字段名称列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象使用的值或值的控件中的每一行指定的字段或字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are then added to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>随后会将对象添加到控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Normally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A> property is used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for a specific data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys%2A>属性用于检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象中的特定数据行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: However, if you just need to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object of the currently selected row, you can simply use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果您只需要检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象的当前选定的行中，你可以只使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>作为快捷方式的属性。

trans-unit.source: As a further shortcut, you can directly determine the data key value of the first key field of the selected row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 作为更快捷的方式，你直接可以确定所选行的第一个键字段的数据键值使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>对象并且想要访问的键字段以外的第一个字段，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedDataKey%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A> property to determine the data key value of the selected row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>属性来确定中所选行的数据键值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Selects the row to edit in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 选择要在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中编辑的行。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: 要编辑的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Puts a row in edit mode in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control by using the specified row index.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中使用指定行索引将某行置于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowEditing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row on the page to edit.
trans-unit.target: 页上要编辑的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the page index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control by using the row index.
trans-unit.target: 使用行索引设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的页索引。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the footer row is displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中显示脚注行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the footer row; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示脚注行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A> property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A>属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示页脚行。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制页脚行的外观，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.FooterStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A> property to display the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowFooter%2A>属性来显示中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header row is displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中显示标题行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the header row; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示标题行，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to specify whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the header row.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示的标题行。

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制标头行的外观，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.HeaderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A> property to display the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ShowHeader%2A>属性来显示中的标题行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the heading of a column in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is visible when the column has no data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当列没有数据时 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中列的标题是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标题可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression with which to sort the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件进行排序时使用的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Sorts the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control based on the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: 根据指定的排序表达式和方向对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method to programmatically sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control using the specified sort expression and direction.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法来以编程方式排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制是通过使用指定的排序表达式和方向。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression specifies the column or columns with which to sort.
trans-unit.target: 排序表达式指定的列或包含要排序的列。

trans-unit.source: To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names.
trans-unit.target: 若要对多个列进行排序，创建包含以逗号分隔的字段名称列表的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 排序方向指示是否在升序或降序执行排序。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control from outside of the control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用时需要进行排序，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件从受控制，如从页上的其他控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is also commonly used to programmatically set a default sort order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control when it is first rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常还用于以编程方式设置的默认排序顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制首次呈现时。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> events.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法也会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method to programmatically sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control by multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法来以编程方式排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>通过多个列的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source control, but the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> that is associated with the data source is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件被绑定到某个数据源控件，但是与该数据源关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort direction of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在排序的列的排序方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SortDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="SortDirection.Ascending" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="SortDirection.Ascending" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A> property to determine whether the column being sorted is sorted in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A>属性来确定是否按升序或降序排序正在排序的列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件有内置的排序功能自动设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the sort direction or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 仅在需要以编程方式确定排序方向，或当你要添加到你自己自定义排序功能时，此属性一般用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A> property to programmatically determine the sort direction of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortDirection%2A>属性以编程方式确定的排序方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 在单击用于列排序的超链接时，但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件对相应的排序操作进行处理之后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>单击超链接列进行排序，但之后时引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as custom sorting, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够在每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程，如自定义排序的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted> event to display the name of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorted>事件来显示正在排序的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按升序对列排序时 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 列的 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按升序对列进行排序时向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件应用了样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，样式应用于列中的单元格上时数据按升序排序。

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is ascending.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当升序排序类型时用特定的颜色突出显示列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the CSS style to apply to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column heading when the column is sorted in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按升序对列进行排序时要应用于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 列标题的 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> heading when the column is sorted in ascending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按升序对列进行排序时向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 标题应用了样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，指示排序方向箭头将显示在列标题。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按升序对列进行排序时 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 列的样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按降序对列进行排序时向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 应用了样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, a style is applied to cells in the column when the data is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，样式应用于列中的单元格上时数据按降序排列。

trans-unit.source: For example, the column can be highlighted with a specific color when the sort type is descending.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当降序排序类型时使用特定的颜色突出显示列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> column heading when the column is sorted in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置按降序对列进行排序时要应用于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 列标题的样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a style is applied to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> heading when the column is sorted in descending order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按降序对列进行排序时向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 标题应用了样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, an arrow that indicates the sort direction is displayed in the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，指示排序方向箭头将显示在列标题。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取与正在排序的列关联的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: The sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 与正在排序的列关联的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A> property to determine the sort expression associated with the column or columns being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A>属性来确定与待排序的列关联的排序表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has a built-in sorting feature that automatically sets this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件有内置的排序功能自动设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used only when you need to programmatically determine the column or columns being sorted or when you are adding your own custom sorting functionality to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性一般用于仅在需要以编程方式确定的列或列进行排序时或当你要添加到你自己自定义排序功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: When multiple columns are sorted, this property contains a comma-separated list of the fields by which to sort.
trans-unit.target: 当多个列进行排序时，则此属性包含逗号分隔的作为排序依据的字段列表。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A> property to determine the name of the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SortExpression%2A>属性来确定正在排序的列的名称。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 在单击用于列排序的超链接时，但在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件对相应的排序操作进行处理之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event is raised when the hyperlink to sort a column is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>单击超链接列进行排序后，之前引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the sorting operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使你能够执行自定义的例程，如取消排序操作，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column and to indicate that the selection operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>对象传递给事件处理方法，使您可以确定列的排序表达式，并可以指示是否应取消了选择操作。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the selection operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消选择操作，请设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSortEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to programmatically initiate a sort operation, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何以编程方式启动排序操作的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sort%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event to perform the sorting functionality when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件以执行排序功能时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件绑定到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting> event to cancel a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Sorting>事件取消排序操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回以控件为目标的回调事件的结果。

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回调的结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to asynchronously retrieve data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A> method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>接口并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>以异步方式检索数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.GetCallbackResult%2A>方法来检索到的数据返回到控件。

trans-unit.source: The argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给事件处理程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates the arguments for the callback handler in the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> 方法中的回调处理程序创建参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the arguments for the callback handler in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> 是一个帮助器方法，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建的自变量中的回调处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.GetCallbackEventReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据值，在 ASP.NET 生成 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值时，这些数据值用于唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: The data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 数据值，在 ASP.NET 生成 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值时，这些数据值用于唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataKeysControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 为引发的一个或多个事件创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs" /> 时所使用的事件参数。

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的合适的事件。

trans-unit.source: The page calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method when a postback event occurs to raise the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 页面调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法来引发相应事件的回发事件发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 加载和更改通知都完成时之后, 但尚未预呈现发生之前，此调用是在页的生命周期中。

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>事件或引发的事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要为其创建回调脚本的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给回调脚本的参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 为执行排序操作的按钮创建回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: The callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行排序操作的按钮的回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23ICallbackContainer%23GetCallbackScript%2A> is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to create the callback script for a button that performs a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23ICallbackContainer%23GetCallbackScript%2A> 是一个帮助器方法，由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建执行排序操作的按钮的回调脚本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据绑定控件中所显示项的主键字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the primary-key fields for the items that are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中所显示项的主键字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供访问权限<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: It is exposed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> Interface.
trans-unit.target: 通过公开<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl>接口。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the table that is exposed by the data source control to bind to the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到数据绑定控件的数据源控件所公开的表。

trans-unit.source: The table that is exposed by the data source control to bind to the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 要绑定到数据绑定控件的数据源控件所公开的表。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use this property to set the specific data table, collection, or other data for the control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个数据源，使用此属性设置的特定数据表、 集合或控件绑定到其他数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> instance that contains multiple tables, you can specify which table to bind the control to by using this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数据源是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>实例，其中包含多个表，你可以指定要使用此属性绑定到控件的表。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves the list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据绑定控件从中检索数据项列表的数据源对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source object that the data-bound control uses.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件所使用的数据源对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves the list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据绑定控件从中检索数据项列表的数据源的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves data items.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件从中检索数据项的数据源的 ID。

trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves the list of data items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据绑定控件从中检索数据项列表的数据源对象。

trans-unit.source: The data source object from which the data-bound control retrieves the list of data items
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件从中检索数据项列表的数据源对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the names of the data fields whose values are appended to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> property value to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，这些数据字段的值附加到 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 属性值，以便唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: The names of the data fields whose values are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 数据字段的名称，在 ASP.NET 生成 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值时，这些数据字段的值用于唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represent the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys" /> value in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对象的集合，这些对象表示数据绑定控件中的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeys" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the data key of each row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含数据绑定控件中每行的数据键。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the selection of a row is based on index or on data-key values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示行的选择是基于索引还是数据键值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row selection is based on data-key values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果行选择基于数据键值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that contains the data key value for the selected row in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，其中包含数据绑定控件中所选行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: The data-key value for the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 所选行的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected row in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据绑定控件中所选行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected row in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件中所选行的索引。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IDataBoundListControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that automatically generates the columns for a data-bound control for use by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个控件，该控件自动为数据绑定控件生成列，供 ASP.NET 动态数据使用。

trans-unit.source: The control that automatically generates the columns for a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 自动为数据绑定控件生成列的控件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IFieldControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IFieldControl> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Dynamic Data supports this property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 动态数据支持此属性。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPersistedSelector.DataKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IPersistedSelector.DataKey" />。

trans-unit.source: The data-key value for the persisted selected record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件中所选持久记录的数据键值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is in paging mode.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定如何选的行时保持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件是否处于分页模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, row selection is based on row index.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，行选择基于行索引。

trans-unit.source: The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page.
trans-unit.target: 每一页上选择同一行 （例如，第三行）。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以启用基于所选行的数据键的持久性。

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，如果你选择第 3 行第 1 页上的，并且你将移动到第 2 页，第 2 页上不选择任何行。

trans-unit.source: If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将移回第 1 页，第 3 行仍处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用此功能，请将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index.
trans-unit.target: 在版本 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5 的 ASP.NET 中，行选择基于仅行索引。

trans-unit.source: By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中的行选择基于为了向后兼容的索引。

trans-unit.source: The button control for which to create the callback script.
trans-unit.target: 要为其创建回调脚本的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> object that represents the postback behavior of the specified button control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> 对象，该对象表示指定的按钮控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" /> that represents the postback behavior of the specified button control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions" />，表示指定的按钮控件的回发行为。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buttonControl" /> parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buttonControl" /> 参数包含 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buttonControl" /> causes validation and is attempting to post back to the same container it validates.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buttonControl" /> 导致了验证操作，正在尝试回发至它验证的容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TagKey%2A> property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TagKey%2A>属性允许要写入的相应 HTML 标记的输出流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A> property is set to `true`, this property returns `HtmlTextWriterTag.Div`; otherwise, this property returns `HtmlTextWriterTag.Table`.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.EnableSortingAndPagingCallbacks%2A>属性设置为`true`，此属性返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Div`; 否则为此属性返回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Table`。

trans-unit.source: You can override this property to specify which <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value to use for your derived control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此属性指定的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" />要使用为您派生的控件的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object that represents the top pager row in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件中的顶部页导航行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> that represents the top pager row in the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" />，表示控件中的顶部页导航行。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A> property to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 启用分页后 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowPaging%2A>属性`true`)，一个称为的页导航行附加行会自动显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to the other pages and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: 页导航行包含允许用户导航至其他页面，可以显示在顶部、 底部，或同时的顶部和底部的控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A> property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object that represents the top pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A>属性以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>对象，表示中的顶部页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A> property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control creates the top pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A>属性是之后才可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件创建中的顶部页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要以编程方式操作顶部页导航行，例如在添加自定义内容时，通常使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A> property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control will overwrite any changes.
trans-unit.target: 对任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A>属性必须执行后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件已经被呈现; 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将覆盖所有更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A> property to access the top pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A>属性来访问中的顶部页导航行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A> property is used to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control from the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.TopPagerRow%2A>属性用于检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件从的页导航行。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control so they can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件的视图状态更改，以便可以将更改存储在该控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 属性可访问此对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将标记控件的视图状态的一部分开始对控件的跟踪并保存更改的起始点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to update data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为了更新数据要调用的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method.
trans-unit.target: 方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to update.
trans-unit.target: 要更新的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform page validation when this method is called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在调用此方法时执行页面验证；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates the record at the specified row index using the field values of the row.
trans-unit.target: 使用行的字段值更新位于指定行索引位置的记录。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UpdateRow%2A> method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UpdateRow%2A>方法来以编程方式更新数据源中的指定索引处的记录。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to update a record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 当你需要更新来自外部的记录通常使用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，例如页上的其他控件。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only for the row that is currently in edit mode, or for a row that contains a two-way data-bound input control.
trans-unit.target: 可以调用此方法仅对当前处于编辑模式的行或行包含双向数据绑定输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定是否在执行更新操作之前执行页验证，使用`causesValidation`参数。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating> events.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法也会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdated>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowUpdating>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UpdateRow%2A> method to programmatically update a record in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UpdateRow%2A>方法来以编程方式更新中的记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to a data source control, but the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> associated with the data source is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件被绑定到某个数据源控件，但是与该数据源关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control renders its header in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件是否以易于访问的格式呈现其标题。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件以易于访问的格式呈现其标题，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control renders its header row in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>属性指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件呈现格式可访问其标题行。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of this property is `true` and the header for the control is rendered using `<th>` table header cell tags.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性的值是`true`和使用呈现该控件的标题`<th>`表头单元格标记。

trans-unit.source: In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`scope="col"`属性添加到表头以指定标头适用于列中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 默认呈现`<th>`保留了元素，从而文本水平呈现为加粗和居中。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the style of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以重写的样式`<th>`元素使用级联样式表。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the header for the control is rendered using `<td>` table cell tags.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是`false`，使用呈现该控件的标题`<td>`表单元格标记。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property to disable the accessible header.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>属性禁用的可访问的标头。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the virtual number of items in the data source that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 在使用自定义分页时，获取或设置数据源中的实际项数 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定。

trans-unit.source: The virtual number of items in the data source that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control is bound to when custom paging is used.
trans-unit.target: 在使用自定义分页时数据源中的实际项数 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> 控件绑定。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性仅当的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AllowCustomPaging%2A> 属性。
